parts.text: {"word":"heating","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"暖房、暖房設備、暖房システム","english_definition":"the process or system used to provide warmth, especially to a building.","examples":[{"sentence":"The heating is on all day in winter.","translation":"冬の間は暖房が一日中ついている。"},{"sentence":"Central heating is common in many homes.","translation":"セントラルヒーティングは多くの家庭で一般的だ。"},{"sentence":"The cost of heating has increased significantly.","translation":"暖房費が大幅に増加した。"}],"collocations":["central heating (セントラルヒーティング)","electric heating (電気暖房)","gas heating (ガス暖房)","underfloor heating (床暖房)","heating system (暖房システム)","heating bill (暖房費)","heating oil (暖房用オイル)"],"synonyms":["warming","warming system","climate control"],"antonyms":["cooling","air conditioning"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"heatの現在分詞","english_definition":"present participle of heat.","examples":[{"sentence":"The water is heating up quickly.","translation":"水が急速に温まっている。"},{"sentence":"She is heating the milk for the baby.","translation":"彼女は赤ちゃんのために牛乳を温めている。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":[],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"動詞「heat」に現在分詞を作る接尾辞「-ing」が付いた形。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"ˈhiːtɪŋ","syllables":"heat-ing"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"heatings"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**heating**」は、主に名詞として「暖房」または「暖房システム」を指します。建物を暖めるための設備や方法全般を指し、具体的な暖房の種類（セントラルヒーティング、電気暖房など）を特定する際に修飾語を伴うことが多いです。動詞「heat」の現在分詞としても使用されますが、この場合は「温めている」という動作を表します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I like the heating in this house. It's very hot.","correct":"✓ I like the heating in this house. It's very effective.","note":"「heating」は暖房システムそのものを指すため、暖房の「効果」を説明する場合は「effective」を使う方が適切です。暖房の「温度」を言いたい場合は、"The temperature of the heating is very high."のように表現します。"},{"incorrect":"✗ We have a heating in our apartment.","correct":"✓ We have heating in our apartment. / ✓ We have a heating system in our apartment.","note":"「heating」は不可算名詞として使われることが多いですが、具体的な暖房システムを指す場合は「a heating system」と表現できます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The heating is very expensive in Japan.","correct":"✓ Heating is very expensive in Japan. / ✓ The cost of heating is very high in Japan.","note":"「heating」は暖房という行為やシステム全般を指すため、一般論として暖房費が高いことを言う場合は冠詞をつけずに「Heating is expensive...」とします。特定の暖房システムについて言及する場合は「The heating system...」とします。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["heat (名詞: 熱、暑さ、動詞: 温める)","heater (名詞: 暖房器具)","heated (形容詞: 熱くなった、白熱した)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**heating**」は、部屋や建物を暖めるためのシステムや行為を指す言葉です。冬に家を暖かく保つために使うものを指すことが多いです。例えば、「The heating is on.（暖房がついている）」のように使います。暖房の種類（セントラルヒーティングなど）を説明するときにも使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **heating** in this building is very efficient.","translation":"この建物の暖房は非常に効率的だ。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"暖房システム"},{"sentence":"We need to turn on the **heating**.","translation":"暖房をつけなければならない。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"暖房"},{"sentence":"The **heating** costs are very high this winter.","translation":"今年の冬は暖房費が非常に高い。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"暖房費"},{"sentence":"She is **heating** up some soup for lunch.","translation":"彼女は昼食にスープを温めている。","type":"verb (present participle)","meaning_category":"温めている"}]}
